Hi, 

  Was reading through the Heritrix code base and found the following:=


workerqueuefrontier.schedule method calls add or addforce on the
alreadyi=
ncluded structure. This method is not synchronized. 

If I use a BDB backed=
 structure, locking is automatic so this should
be ok. But if I use bloomfi=
lter , since bloom filter add/addforce
methods are not synchronized either,=
 wouldn't this cause issue in a
multithreaded environment?
